title: More Than A Vacation: Family Hikes The Appalachian Trail
teaser: The Appalachian Trail is more than 2,000 miles long, stretching from Georgia to Maine. NPR's Rachel Martin speaks with the four members of the Kallin family, who are walking the entire length of it.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
